1ï¸âƒ£ Chat with AI
âœ”ï¸ AI Chat: Open the Sidepanel to start chatting and easily ask about anything.

2ï¸âƒ£ Chat & Summarization
âœ”ï¸ Web Page Summarization: Get summaries without reading the entire web page.
âœ”ï¸ Web Page Chat: Chat directly with web pages and get answers based on their content.
âœ”ï¸ Multi-Webpage Chat/Summarization: Chat with or summarize multiple pages simultaneously, allowing you to interact with and get insights from multiple sources at once.
âœ”ï¸ Document Chat: Upload documents and ask specific questions to streamline research.
âœ”ï¸ YouTube Insights: Summarize and repurpose YouTube content.

3ï¸âƒ£ Web Page Automation
âœ”ï¸ Page Actions: Simply input your tasks in plain language, and automate the browser actions on the page using the AI assistant.
âœ”ï¸ Replay: Save your executed page actions and replay them for free on similarly structured pages.
âœ”ï¸ Complex Agent: A page actions agent with cross-page/multi-step reasoning and autonomous decision-making.
âœ”ï¸ Complex Agent: A page actions agent with cross-page/multi-step reasoning and autonomous decision-making.
âœ”ï¸ Automated Control Flow: Streamline repeat tasks and looped data processes with intelligent automation.
âœ”ï¸ Automated Workflow Editor: Design and customize automated workflows with a user-friendly visual editor.

4ï¸âƒ£ Extract Web Data
âœ”ï¸ Data Extraction: Chat directly with web pages to extract data from them.
âœ”ï¸ Data Download: Available in XLSX & JSON formats.
âœ”ï¸ Replay: Save your data extraction actions and replay them for free on similarly structured pages.
âœ”ï¸ Scheduled Data Monitoring and Alerts: Web page tracker that automatically refreshes ğŸ”„ any page and periodically retrieves data, monitoring information such as pricing, inventory, and other web elements. Alerts or endpoints are triggered based on rules you set in advance.

â“ Frequently Asked Questions:

ğŸ“Œ Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create an account for free on our website.

Yes, we are available in all countries.

Yes, we provide new users with 100,000 tokens and offer a weekly quota of 10,000 tokens for ongoing use. For unlimited access, consider our Pro Plans when you need to scale up.
